articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: New DisplayPort spec enables 16K video over USB-C - The Verge
articles.description: DisplayPort Alt Mode 2.0 is a new VESA standard that will one day allow USB 4 to match the DisplayPort 2.0 standard. That means support for 4K displays at 144Hz with HDR, or even 16K (15360x8460) displays at 60Hz with compression.
articles.content:
DisplayPort Alt Mode 2.0 will start appearing in devices next year
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
